resources.string:
உங்கள் நேரத்தை நாங்கள் மதிக்கிறோம் மற்றும் விளம்பரங்கள் இல்லாமல் எங்கள் பயன்பாட்டை நீங்கள் அனுபவிக்க விரும்புகிறோம். இது உங்களுக்கு மகிழ்ச்சியையும் பயனையும் தந்திருந்தால், அதன் வளர்ச்சிக்கு நன்கொடை அளிக்கவும்.

எங்களின் கடின உழைப்பைப் பாராட்டுங்கள் மற்றும் உங்கள் பதிவுகளைப் பகிர்ந்து கொள்ளுங்கள், இது புதிய யோசனைகளை உணரவும் மேலும் அற்புதமான அம்சங்களை உங்களுக்கு வழங்கவும் உதவும்.
Accent color of Black & White theme
உங்கள் எல்லா கோப்புகளுக்கும் எங்கள் பயன்பாட்டு அணுகலை வழங்கவும், அது இல்லாமல் அது சரியாக இயங்காது.
Enter a number or a pattern (e.g. *12345*, +1*8888) to block all calls and messages from numbers matching the pattern.
Time remaining till the alarm goes off:\n%s
Please make sure the alarm works properly before relying on it. It could misbehave due to system restrictions related to battery saving.
You must allow the app accessing internal alarms, else it cannot send scheduled messages.
You must allow the app accessing internal alarms, else it cannot turn off the application after sleep timer.
You must allow the app displaying full screen notifications, else you may miss some incoming calls.
You must allow the app displaying full screen notifications, else you may miss some reminders.
You must allow the app accessing your location, else it won\'t know it.
You must allow the app displaying notifications, else it cannot show the progress bar.
You must allow the app displaying notifications, else it cannot show incoming calls.
You must allow the app displaying notifications, else it cannot show incoming messages.
You must allow the app displaying notifications, else it cannot play songs.
You must allow the app displaying notifications, else it cannot show reminders.
You must allow the app displaying notifications, else it cannot record audio.

WARNING: Some launchers do not handle app icon customization properly. In case the icon will disappear, try launching the app via Google Play or some widget, if available. Once launched, just set back the default orange icon #F57C00. You might have to reinstall the app in the worst case.

You seem to have the app installed on an SD card, that makes the app widgets unavailable. You won\'t even see them on the list of available widgets. It is a system limitation, so if you want to use the widgets, you have to move the app back on the internal storage.
Apply colors to all Simple Apps
Are you sure you want to move this item into the Recycle Bin?
Authentication blocked, please try again in a moment
Before you ask a question, please first read the
Before you ask a question, please check the app settings and read the Frequently Asked Questions first. Maybe the solution is there.
Before you rate us, please check the app settings and read the Frequently Asked Questions first. If you have any problems, maybe the solution is there.
Block calls from not stored contacts
Block messages from not stored contacts
The tab bar will move to the bottom
Starting from Android 11 you cannot hide files and folders like that anymore
Changing a color will make it switch to Custom theme
முதன்மை நிறம், உச்சரிப்பு, பின்னணி, உரை மற்றும் வழிசெலுத்தல் பட்டியின் கைமுறை சரிசெய்தல்
Please press \'Save\' at the bottom of the next screen to create the new folder.
Please allow the app accessing the selected storage on the next screen by pressing \'Use this folder\' at the bottom.
Please allow accessing \'%s\' on the next screen by pressing \'Use this folder\' at the bottom.
Please choose the top folder of the SD card on the next screen, to grant write access
If you don\'t see the SD card, try this
Please choose the top folder of the USB device on the next screen, to grant access

This list contains everyone that noticeably helped any app within the Simple Mobile Tools suite, not only this one. Translations are handled by volunteers, let us know if you want to help too. The guide to translating is at this website, or just contact us at hello@simplemobiletools.com if you have any questions. Thanks to all contributors and other supporters!

This list contains everyone that noticeably helped any app within the Goodwy suite, not only this one. Translations are handled by volunteers, let us know if you want to help too. The guide to translating is at this website, or just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com if you have any questions. Thanks to all contributors and other supporters!
Some files could not be copied
Android Image Cropper (image crop and rotate)

You can use the following patterns to name your file automatically:

%Y - year
%M - month
%D - day
%h - hour
%m - minute
%s - second
Tab to open at app start
DEPRECATED: This version of the app is no longer maintained, get the Pro version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.simplemobiletools.xxx.pro
DEPRECATED: This version of the app is no longer maintained, get the Pro version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.goodwy.xxx.pro
A group of simple, open source Android apps with customizable widgets, without ads and unnecessary permissions.

Hello,

hope you are enjoying the app. It contains no ads and we aren\'t collecting your data either, please support its development by purchasing Simple Thank You. You will also have all app features including color customization unlocked.

Thank you!

Hello,

hope you are enjoying the app. It contains no ads, please support its development by purchasing the Simple Thank You app, it will also prevent this dialog from showing up again.

Thank you!
Support us by purchasing Simple Thank You please, it will also unlock all app features including color customization.

For those who do not use Google Play, it is possible to unlock all functions of the application.
If you like our apps which are offline, non-intrusive and have no ads, please consider supporting us in some way. We would be very grateful.

Thank you!
Send your feedback or suggestions to
Empty and disable the Recycle Bin
மறுசுழற்சி தொட்டியை காலியாக்க நீங்கள் உறுதியா? கோப்புகளை நிரந்தரமாக இழப்பீர்கள்.

A private contact is created within an application. This contact will not be visible to other applications. If you uninstall the app, all private contacts will be deleted along with the app, so back up your contacts before uninstalling the app.
When you create a contact, you must select the source of the contact: %s
How to create a private contact?
Try clearing your Google Play app cache and restarting your device. It is some Google Play glitch, not really related to the app itself.
I have purchased the app, but I cannot download it on another device.

It is most likely because you moved the app on an SD card. There is an Android system limitation which hides the given app widgets in that case. The only solution is to move the app back onto the Internal Storage via your device settings.
How come I don\'t see this apps widget on the list of widgets?

Yes, of course. You can spread the word about the apps or give good feedback and ratings. You can also help by translating the apps in a new language, or just update some existing translations. The guide to translating is at this website, or just contact us at hello@simplemobiletools.com if you have any questions.

Yes, of course. You can spread the word about the apps or give good feedback and ratings. You can also help by translating the apps in a new language, or just update some existing translations. You can find the guide at https://github.com/Goodwy/Discussion , or just shoot me a message at goodwy.dev@gmail.com if you need help.
I want to support you, but I cannot donate money. Is there anything else I can do?
Sadly, you cannot. Files are deleted instantly after the confirmation dialog, there is no trashbin available.
I deleted some files by mistake, how can I recover them?

Yep, as you drag a widget on your home screen a widget config screen appears. You will see colored squares at the bottom left corner, just press them to pick a new color. You can use the slider for adjusting the alpha too.
I don\'t like the widget colors, can I change them?
If they were really deleted, you cannot. However, there is a Recycle Bin enabled by default, it will cause the files just be moved in the Bin instead of deleting them.
Can I somehow restore deleted files?

It is caused by your launcher not supporting icon customization properly. Try launching the app via Google Play or some widget, if available. Once launched, just set back the default orange icon #F57C00. You might have to reinstall the app in the worst case.
The app launcher icon disappeared. What can I do?
Payments are fully handled by Google, their system glitches from time to time. Just clear your Google Play app cache and restart your device, then retry downloading it.
The money has been deducted from my bank account, but I cannot download the app. What can I do?

As your app version is no longer updated, the bugs you have maybe spotted will never be fixed. There will also be no new functions added. You can purchase the Pro version on Google Play for a small sum of money. It is a one time payment, which means that once you purchase it, you will never have to pay again. Not even after getting a new device. If you won\'t like the Pro version, you can just uninstall it within a few hours and you will automatically get your money back. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at hello@simplemobiletools.com and you will get it.

As your app version is no longer updated, the bugs you have maybe spotted will never be fixed. There will also be no new functions added. You can purchase the Pro version on Google Play for a small sum of money. It is a one time payment, which means that once you purchase it, you will never have to pay again. Not even after getting a new device. If you won\'t like the Pro version, you can just uninstall it within a few hours and you will automatically get your money back. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at goodwy.dev@gmail.com and you will get it.
Why should I upgrade to the Pro version?

There are multiple ways of doing that. The first one is starting the selection mode by long pressing one item, then short clicking on others to select them. The second way is similar to selecting items on PCs with a mouse, just start the selection mode by long pressing one item, then with your finger still down drag it across other items for selecting. The third way of selecting multiple items is long pressing one item, then long pressing another one and everything in between gets selected. If you want to select all items, just long press one item, then click at the selected item counter at the top left corner. That will select or unselect all everything.
How can I select multiple items at once?

This feature is locked, please purchase Simple Thank You for unlocking the full app.

It is a one time payment only and if you won\'t be satisfied, we can refund you.
"தொடர்வதற்கு உங்கள் கைரேகை அல்லது திரைப் பூட்டைப் பயன்படுத்துங்கள்"

This protection works in this app only, it is not supposed to replace a real systemwide folder encryption.
"ஆண்டைத் தேர்வுசெய்ய ஸ்வைப் செய்யுங்கள் அல்லது தேதியைத் தேர்வுசெய்யும் பக்கத்திற்கு மீண்டும் செல்ல தட்டுங்கள்"

Hello,

seems like you just upgraded from the free version. Once you are happy with this one and maybe migrated your data over, you can uninstall the old free one to avoid launching it accidentally as you will not need it anymore.

Thanks!

Hello,

seems like you just upgraded from the free version. If you want to migrate your locally stored events over, you have to do it manually by exporting them into an .ics file in the free app version and importing here through the top menu. 

Once you are satisfied with your setup in the Pro version, you can uninstall the old free one as you won't need it anymore.

Thanks!

Hello,

seems like you just upgraded from the free version. If you had any contacts stored under "%s", you have to migrate them manually by exporting in a .vcf file from the free app version and importing here through the top menu.

Once you are satisfied with your setup in the Pro version, you can uninstall the old free one as you won't need it anymore.

Thanks!

Hello,

seems like you just upgraded from the free version. Once you are happy with this one and maybe migrated your settings and favorites over, you can uninstall the old free one to avoid launching it accidentally as you will not need it anymore.

Thanks!

Hello,

seems like you just upgraded from the free version. If you want to migrate your notes over, you have to do it manually by exporting them into a file in the free app version and importing here through the top menu. 

Once you are satisfied with your setup in the Pro version, you can uninstall the old free one as you won't need it anymore.

Thanks!

seems like you already have the Pro app version too. Once you are happy with it and maybe migrated your data over, you can uninstall this one to avoid launching it accidentally as you will not need it anymore.

seems like you already have the Pro app version too. Once you are happy with it and maybe migrated your settings and favorites over, you can uninstall this one to avoid launching it accidentally as you will not need it anymore.
